pkgmetadata.longdescription: Selection and Ranking of Omics Biomarkers Combinations Made Easy // Provides functions and a workflow to easily and powerfully calculating specificity, sensitivity and ROC curves of biomarkers combinations. Allows to rank and select multi- markers signatures as well as to find the best performing sub- signatures. The method used was first published as a Shiny app and described in Mazzara et al. (2017) doi:10.1038/srep45477 and further described in Bombaci Rossi (2019) doi:10.1007/978-1-4939-9164-8_16.
